message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go quite that low. How about we meet closer to the middle at $150?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
